## Hello 👋🏼!, I’m [Daniel García](https://danielgarcia.me),
### Software Specialist.

> <p style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 4px;">Currently may find me at <a href="https://www.encora.com/es/"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Encora-44197e?style=flat-square&logoColor=white&logo=data:image/png;base64," alt="Encora" /></a> coding something awesome.</p>

I'm a self-made developer with 12 years of experience in the software development. Specialist in web solutions and constantly growing towards software architecture.

Outside of work, I still enjoy working on personal projects, including video game development, and I also play guitar, and piano; I love reading and going to the movies.
